data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module sits alongside HTML::Element (and HTML::Tree modules in
    general) and provides a simple query mechanism.

    It does not include any pictures of cats, nor does it have any
    bacon taped to the side of it. But that can be arranged if you think
    it would make it more popular on the Internetz.
